Lily Sado SEA+TEA Detox Purifying Mask, Dead Sea Mud & Black Tea

Brand: Lily Sado

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Dead Sea Mud, Aloe Juice, Glycerin, Kaolin Clay, Butylene Glycol, Shea Butter, Sunflower Oil, Lactic Acid, Camellia Sinensis (Black Tea) Leaf Extract, Vegetable Glycerin, Vitamin E, Allantoin, Jojoba Oil, Xanthan Gum, Pheno

, Xanthan Gum, Phenoxyethanol, CI77492, CI77499.

Directions: Apply an even layer of mud mask to your dry face and neck. Allow 10-15 minutes for the mask to dry. Rinse well with warm water. Follow-up with LILY SADO serum and moisturizer. Use 2-4 times per week.
